column2:
"You did it.
The scene of you killing such
a huge opponent could be a painting."

"I've love to have taken a photograph
to display."

"Well, it looks like you'll have
another chance to show me, even if I
couldn't get a photo."

"I won't hold back from calling
for you, so keep it in mind. Bye."

"戻て来たね。
あんたがデカい相手を仕留める場面は
ほんと絵になるね。"
"写真に撮って飾っておきたいくらい。"

"ま、撮らなくても
見せてもらう機会はまたありそうだし。"

"遠慮なく声掛けさせてもらうから
よろしく。じゃあね。"
